statements: UPDATE financial_data SET stock_price = 100.50, stock_volume = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE financial_data SET trade_date = '2022-08-15', stock_price = 150.75 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE financial_data SET stock_volume = 1000, trade_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE company_name = 'ABC Company' AND stock_price > 50;
UPDATE financial_data SET stock_price = 60.75, trade_date = '2022-02-01' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE financial_data SET closing_price = 1250.75, volume = 5000 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE regression_analysis SET p_value = 0.003, accuracy = 98.76 WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE financial_data SET closing_price = 1500.75, volume = 10000 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE regression_analysis SET accuracy = 97.65, regression_coefficient = 0.543, p_value = 0.002 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE FinancialData SET closing_price = 105.75 WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE StockTrends SET trend = 'Upward' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE FinancialData SET volume = 1000, closing_price = 50.75 WHERE id = 123;
UPDATE StockTrends SET trend = 'Upward' WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE financial_data SET closing_price = 1500.50 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-07-15';
UPDATE model_parameters SET parameter_value = 0.75 WHERE model_id = 102 AND parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
UPDATE financial_data SET closing_price = 1150.75, volume = 50000 WHERE financial_id = 100;
UPDATE regression_models SET model_type = 'Linear Regression', training_data_table = 'financial_data', prediction_result_table = 'prediction_results' WHERE model_id = 200;
UPDATE financial_data SET closing_price = 1200.45, opening_price = 1210.75 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-10-05';
UPDATE regression_results SET actual_value = 1120.85, prediction_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' AND prediction = 1150.20;
UPDATE financial_data SET closing_price = 1500.75, opening_price = 1510.25 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-10-05';
UPDATE regression_results SET prediction = 1300.50, actual_value = 1295.75, prediction_date = '2022-10-07' WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL' AND id = 10;
